summary: Comprehensive testing of refactored backend (modular routes) and frontend. All 42 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI fully functional with all components working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Backend refactoring successful - all routes properly modularized into /app/backend/routes/
Route modules correctly initialized with database injection pattern (init_router functions)
All API endpoints working: transactions, analytics, portfolio, recurring, budget_envelopes, currency, categories, ai
Frontend hooks created in /app/frontend/src/hooks/ but App.js still uses direct API calls (hooks available for future use)
No regression in existing functionality - all CRUD operations work correctly
seed_data_creation: Test data created during testing was cleaned up (TEST_ prefixed items)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Refactoring task completed successfully. Backend split from monolithic server.py into modular route files under /app/backend/routes/. All routes tested: transactions.py, analytics.py, portfolio.py, recurring.py, budget_envelopes.py, currency.py, categories.py, ai.py, users.py, subscription.py, admin.py. Frontend hooks created but App.js still uses direct API calls. All existing functionality preserved.

backend_routes.transactions: ✅ CRUD operations - create, read, update, delete all working

frontend_components.login_page: ✅ Login form working with admin credentials
frontend_components.sidebar: ✅ Menu toggle and sidebar navigation working

route_modules_tested: ai.py - AI assistant, voice parsing, quotes
